### Nutritious food belongs to us all

As a food bank, Second Harvest is a network leader that finds strength by participating, hope by listening, and connection by sharing with our community.

### Our Approach

We believe that everyone in our community should have equal access to nutritious, affordable, and culturally meaningful food. Through our core services of food acquisition & storage, food distribution, and FoodShare Outreach we provide those facing hunger in our community access to enough nutritious food to thrive.

### Vision 

Everyone in our community has enough nutritious food to thrive.

### Mission 

Second Harvest exists to end hunger in southwestern Wisconsin.

### Values 

Equity • Humility • Inclusion • Innovation • Integrity • Trust
